getting started.introduction: To get started using the Translator Bot you will need to provide a Twitch Bot Access token that allows the bot to connect to Twitch.
getting started.token help:
The easiest way to obtain a token is by generating a
"Bot Chat Token" using the Twitch Token Generator.
getting started.open token generator: Go to the Twitch Token Generator
getting started.token hint: Never share this token with anyone
getting started.channel hint: The name of your Twitch Channel
